A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Mainstream critics want to invalidate my rating by saying I'm a bot. But I'm a REAL PERSON who hated this movie.
So many other real reviewers have already listed at length the horrible failures of this movie I won't bore you by repeating them.
But I will stress that the movie is ruined by the pathological need to focus on so-called "progressive" political and social issues\, not the least of which is the subtext that all men are idiots and only women are truly wise leaders.
The movie is grim\, depressing\, disappointing\, illogical\, nonsensical\, and a true failure in every sense of the word. The action is not exciting. The characters are not engaging. The plot is so stupid it's insulting.
If this movie didn't carry the Star Wars label it would be an abject failure at the box office. No one left the theater smiling or happy or excited. The entire audience was subdued and pretty unhappy. No applause at the end of the movie\, just sad silence. No whoops of delight or excitement during the movie\, just quiet boredom or stunned disbelief at the underwhelming antics.
Read the other reviews for point-by-point iterations of the stupidity of the plot and wrong-headedness of the direction.
A sad\, sad day for the Star Wars canon. This movie will long be remembered as a huge disappointment and an embarrassment\, probably considered even worse than The Phantom Menace (words I though I'd never say about any SW movie).
Shame on you\, Disney.
